mdRecord.dcterms:description: The photographs in the exhibition of the house that the Rohlfs designed and built at 156 Park St. (still extant) in 1912 reveal a sense of structural harmony between woodwork and furniture that sidesteps typical Victorian clutter. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Rohlfs [work]
